channel.title: Making a Owner Icon?
channel.description:
Hi there, I want to make an Owner only Icon and maybe a donator icon too, how would i go about doing this please? i have made the icon's but how do i get the client to read which people belong to which icon etc etc?
Thanks in advance Fluoxetine

item.title: Making a Owner Icon?
item.dc:creator: @Fluoxetine Fluoxetine
item.description:
@Fluoxetine wrote:

[quote=“Joker^, post:4, topic:347408”]Some guides for clients run for all clients its the odd clients that dont comunicate properly

so just find a normal one and try it and just keep trying is all you can do lol[/quote]

I have looked at the guides and they all say something about Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub2 or something like that?
I guess i will just have to keep the old ones as they are

Read full topic
